messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] File - Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry Joyce,  I am just now learning what you mean when you say that.  I wouldn t see that I had changed the topic until I had sent the message. Kelli T.
messages.messageBody:
Sorry Joyce, I am just now learning what you mean when you say that. I wouldn't see that I had changed the topic until I had sent the message.
Kelli T.

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] File - Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Joyce:  I am an mom of a 8 and 4 year old who lives in Montana and unschools her kids.  My name is Lisa.  Because of the unusually high volume of email I
messages.messageBody:
Dear Joyce: I am an mom of a 8 and 4 year old who lives in Montana and
unschools her kids. My name is Lisa. Because of the unusually high
volume of email I am going to select a weekly reading instead. This
morning I woke up to 177 emails. I can't do that justice. Lisa

-----Original Message-----
From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com]
Sent: Wednesday, September 04, 2002 7:21 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] File - Don't forget! If you change topics,
change the subject


As a kindness to others who would like to skip some threads.

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator
